channel.title: Two little questions, big problems
channel.description:
[blue]I got two simple questions, that cause big problems for me[/blue]
[red]1:[/red] [green]When my server is up and running, randomly null's keep logging online, in my batch file it sais this twice apposed to once.[/green] [code]clientHandler: accepted from COMPNAME:####[/code] [green]Which causes null's to keep logging onto my server, it is really annoying and causes a lot of lagg.[/green]
[blue]2:[/blue] [green]When I log into my server, the HP of the player goes to 10, no matter what it was before, I changed this to 99, but now everyone that logs in has 99HP, even when they are supposed to have 10, does anyone know how to fix this, its probobly something pretty simple...[/green]

item.title: Two little questions, big problems
item.dc:creator: @inuyasha_12345 inuyasha 12345
item.description:
@inuyasha_12345 wrote:

Once in a while it’s constant, but sometimes it doesn’t do it at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Two little questions, big problems
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

For number one. How often do they log in? if its non stop, you could have a crasher. IF tis ever so often, its server statuses or what not.

Read full topic

item.title: Two little questions, big problems
item.dc:creator: @inuyasha_12345 inuyasha 12345
item.description:
@inuyasha_12345 wrote:

[blue]I got two simple questions, that cause big problems for me[/blue]

[red]1:[/red] [green]When my server is up and running, randomly null’s keep logging online, in my batch file it sais this twice apposed to once.[/green]

clientHandler: accepted from COMPNAME:####

[green]Which causes null’s to keep logging onto my server, it is really annoying and causes a lot of lagg.[/green]

[blue]2:[/blue] [green]When I log into my server, the HP of the player goes to 10, no matter what it was before, I changed this to 99, but now everyone that logs in has 99HP, even when they are supposed to have 10, does anyone know how to fix this, its probobly something pretty simple…[/green]
